arts.ttl: Mallorca vs Atletico Madrid – Match preview and team news
arts.sum: Mallorca and Atletico Madrid go head-to-head in La Liga action on Sunday. The home side are desperate to escape the relegation zone while Atletico Madrid also aim to climb up the table after a mixed start to the season. Mallorca vs Atletico Madrid – Match Preview and Team News Date: 21st September, Sunday. Kick-off: 3:15pm BST.
